stories.text:
Wonderful series with great performances of Edi Gathegi and Martin Freeman [1]. Unbelievable rollercoaster of events with up to date themes like crypto, VÃ‡'s, dark web...

Don't watch it if you're a techno perfectionist. The way they write code is hilarious, releasing software patches is instantaneous and new products are created in a week. Yet, some of the management faults and chasing VC money are quite realistic.

I had a great time (and some great peaceful nights because I realized things can still get worse in startup land ;-)

Post which tech/mgmt pieces you liked most, perhaps with a [spoiler alert] for those who haven't seen it yet.

[1] https://www.netflix.com/title/80154285
